search.query: `engagement_healthcheck_index` | stats count by source | rex field=source "(?<reportdirectory>.*)?\/[^\/]+$" | fields reportdirectory | dedup reportdirectory

`engagement_healthcheck_index` sourcetype=engagement_healthcheck* source="$reportdirectory$/license_usage_by_sourcetype.json" | table result.* | rename result.* AS * | eval _time=strptime(_time,"%F %H:%M:%S.%f %Z") | bucket _time span=1d | chart sum(*) AS * by _time | table _time, *, OTHER

`engagement_healthcheck_index` sourcetype=engagement_healthcheck* source="$reportdirectory$/search_volume.json" | table result.* | rename result.* AS * | eval _time=strptime(_time,"%F %H:%M:%S.%f %Z") | stats sum(*) AS * by _time

`engagement_healthcheck_index` sourcetype=engagement_healthcheck* source="$reportdirectory$/cpu_usage_overview.json" | table result.* | rename result.* AS * | eval _time=strptime(_time,"%F %H:%M:%S.%f %Z") | table _time, *

`engagement_healthcheck_index` sourcetype=engagement_healthcheck* source="$reportdirectory$/memory_usage_overview.json" | table result.* | rename result.* AS * | eval _time=strptime(_time,"%F %H:%M:%S.%f %Z") | stats sum(*) AS * by _time | table _time, *

`engagement_healthcheck_index` sourcetype=engagement_healthcheck* source="$reportdirectory$/license_summary.json" | rename result.* AS * | table splunk_server, type, sourcetypes, license, status, expiration_time, quotaGB

`engagement_healthcheck_index` sourcetype=engagement_healthcheck* source="$reportdirectory$/splunk_servers.json" | table result.* | rename result.* AS * | eval _time=strptime(_time,"%F %H:%M:%S.%f %Z") | eval server_roles=if(mvcount('server_roles{}')>0,'server_roles{}',server_roles) | table splunk_server, product_type, version, server_roles, os_name_extended, os_version, cpu_arch, numberOfCores, numberOfVirtualCores, physicalMemoryMB, fips_mode, isForwarding, isFree, isTrial, kvStoreStatus, licenseState, master_uri,

`engagement_healthcheck_index` sourcetype=engagement_healthcheck* source="$reportdirectory$/splunk_server_settings.json" | table result.* | rename result.* AS * | eval _time=strptime(_time,"%F %H:%M:%S.%f %Z") | table splunk_server, SPLUNK_DB, SPLUNK_HOME, appServerPorts, enableSplunkWebSSL, httpport, kvStoreDisabled, kvStorePort, mgmtHostPort, minFreeSpace, pass4SymmKey, serverName, sessionTimeout, startwebserver, trustedIP | fields - pass4SymmKey

`engagement_healthcheck_index` sourcetype=engagement_healthcheck* source="$reportdirectory$/search_peer_summary.json" | rename result.* AS * | table splunk_server, cluster_label, guid, title, host, host_fqdn, status. version, os_name, isForwarding, is_https, peerName, peerType, replicationStatus, rtsearch_enabled, search_groups, searchable_indexes

`engagement_healthcheck_index` sourcetype=engagement_healthcheck* source="$reportdirectory$/deployment_client_summary.json" | rename result.* AS * | eval serverClasses=if(mvcount('serverClasses{}')>0,'serverClasses{}',serverClasses) | eval clientName=if(mvcount('clientName{}')>0,'clientName{}',clientName) | table splunk_server, serverClasses, targetUri, clientName

`engagement_healthcheck_index` sourcetype=engagement_healthcheck* source="$reportdirectory$/deployment_clients_summary.json" | rename result.* AS * | table splunk_server, clientName, ip, dns, hostname, package, splunkVersion, utsname

`engagement_healthcheck_index` sourcetype=engagement_healthcheck* source="$reportdirectory$/active_users.json" | table result.* | rename result.* AS *, host AS splunk_server | eval users=if(mvcount('users{}')>0,'users{}',users) | table splunk_server, "Distinct Users", users

`engagement_healthcheck_index` sourcetype=engagement_healthcheck* source="$reportdirectory$/adhoc_searches.json" | table result.* | rename result.* AS * | eval _time=strptime(_time,"%F %H:%M:%S.%f %Z") | stats sum(*) AS * by _time

`engagement_healthcheck_index` sourcetype=engagement_healthcheck* source="$reportdirectory$/forwarder_status.json" | table result.* | rename result.* AS * | rename "Average KB/s Over Time{}" AS "Average KB/s Over Time" | table Instance, Type, Version, OS, Architecture, Status, "Last Connected to Indexers", "Total KB", "Average KB/s Over Time", "Average KB/s", "Average Events/s"

`engagement_healthcheck_index` sourcetype=engagement_healthcheck* source="$reportdirectory$/scheduler_summary.json" | table result.* | rename result.* AS * | eval _time=strptime(_time,"%F %H:%M:%S.%f %Z") | eval scheduled_search=if(mvcount('scheduled_search{}')>0,'scheduled_search{}',scheduled_search) | table Instance, "CPU Cores (Physical / Virtual)", "Concurrency of Historical Scheduled Report (Running/Limit)", "Concurrency of Real-time Scheduled Report (Running/Limit)", "Unique Scheduled Reports"

`engagement_healthcheck_index` sourcetype=engagement_healthcheck* source="$reportdirectory$/sources_and_sourcetypes.json" | table result.* | rename result.* AS * | table value, type, totalCount, firstTime, lastTime, recentTime | chart sum(totalCount) AS totalCount by value

`engagement_healthcheck_index` sourcetype=engagement_healthcheck* source="$reportdirectory$/heavy_forwarder_volume.json" | table result.* | rename result.* AS * | eval _time=strptime(_time,"%F %H:%M:%S.%f %Z") | table Instance,"Average KB/s", "Average Events/s" | stats sum("Average KB/s") AS "Average KB/s" by Instance

`engagement_healthcheck_index` sourcetype=engagement_healthcheck* source="$reportdirectory$/execution_latency_overview.json" | table result.* | rename result.* AS * | eval _time=strptime(_time,"%F %H:%M:%S.%f %Z") | where average_latency>5 OR max_latency>5 | table _time, host, average_latency, max_latency | chart sum(average_latency) AS average_latency, sum(max_latency) AS max_latency over _time by host

`engagement_healthcheck_index` sourcetype=engagement_healthcheck* source="$reportdirectory$/searches_by_duration.json" | table result.* | rename result.* AS * | table splunk_server,search_type, savedsearch_name, count, user, cron_schedule, schedule_window, allow_skew, status, app, max_run_time, average_run_time,total_run_time | eval search=splunk_server+":"+savedsearch_name | top 10 max_run_time by search

`engagement_healthcheck_index` sourcetype=engagement_healthcheck* source="$reportdirectory$/scheduled_search_skipped_searches.json" | table result.* | rename result.* AS * | eval _time=strptime(_time,"%F %H:%M:%S.%f %Z") | eval status=if(mvcount('status{}')>0,'status{}',status) | table splunk_server, savedsearch_name, count, user, cron_schedule, schedule_window, status, app, max_run_time, average_run_time,total_run_time

`engagement_healthcheck_index` sourcetype=engagement_healthcheck* source="$reportdirectory$/scheduled_search_concurrency_as_percentage_of_max.json" | table result.* | rename result.* AS * | eval _time=strptime(_time,"%F %H:%M:%S.%f %Z") | table overlap_minute, *

`engagement_healthcheck_index` sourcetype=engagement_healthcheck* source="$reportdirectory$/searches_exceeding_frequency.json" | table result.* | rename result.* AS * | eval _time=strptime(_time,"%F %H:%M:%S.%f %Z") | eval splunk_server=if(mvcount('splunk_server{}')>0,'splunk_server{}',splunk_server) | table _time app, alert_action, splunk_server, component, user search_type, savedsearch_name status scheduled_time run_time result_count, event_message, cron_schedule, search

`engagement_healthcheck_index` sourcetype=engagement_healthcheck* source="$reportdirectory$/data_onboarding_issues.json" | table result.* | rename result.* AS * | eval _time=strptime(_time,"%F %H:%M:%S.%f %Z") | eval splunk_server=if(mvcount('splunk_server{}')>0,'splunk_server{}',splunk_server) | table problem, count, splunk_server

`engagement_healthcheck_index` sourcetype=engagement_healthcheck* source="$reportdirectory$/cluster_settings_summary.json" | rename result.* AS * | table splunk_server, cluster_label, mode, forwarderdata_rcv_port, forwarderdata_use_ssl, guid, manual_detention, multisite, site, site_replication_factor, site_search_factor, search_factor, replication_factor, replication_port, replication_use_ssl, rolling_restart, summary_replication

`engagement_healthcheck_index` sourcetype=engagement_healthcheck* source="$reportdirectory$/searchhead_cluster_summary.json" | rename result.* AS * | table splunk_server, splunk_server_group, guid, site, status, is_captain, preferred_captain, adhoc_searchhead, replication_port, replication_use_ssl, advertise_restart_required, , last_heartbeat, pending_job_count
`engagement_healthcheck_index` sourcetype=engagement_healthcheck* source="$reportdirectory$/searchhead_cluster_captain_change.json" | rename result.* AS * | table Time, splunk_server, Event

`engagement_healthcheck_index` sourcetype=engagement_healthcheck* source="$reportdirectory$/indexes_with_time_skew.json" | table result.* | rename result.* AS * | eval _time=strptime(_time,"%F %H:%M:%S.%f %Z") | table splunk_server,"latest(host)", sourcetype index, diff,

`engagement_healthcheck_index` sourcetype=engagement_healthcheck* source="$reportdirectory$/data_inputs_index_mapping.json" | table result.* | rename result.* AS * | eval _time=strptime(_time,"%F %H:%M:%S.%f %Z") | eval input=if(mvcount('input{}')>0,'input{}','input') | table splunk_server, index, disabled, input_count, input

`engagement_healthcheck_index` sourcetype=engagement_healthcheck* source="$reportdirectory$/index_volume_summary.json" | table result.* | rename result.* AS * | eval _time=strptime(_time,"%F %H:%M:%S.%f %Z") | table splunk_server, title, max_size, total_size, volume_path

`engagement_healthcheck_index` sourcetype=engagement_healthcheck* source="/var/engagement_data/ccs_data/utf8/indexes_summary.json" | table result.* | rename result.* AS * | table splunk_server, title, app, homePath, homePath_expanded, homePath.maxDataSizeMB, coldPath, coldPath_expanded, coldPath.maxDataSizeMB, disabled, totalEventCount, maxDataSize, maxTotalDataSizeMB, currentDBSizeMB, frozenTimePeriodInSecs,minTime, maxTime, rententionDays, daysSinceEvent

`engagement_healthcheck_index` sourcetype=engagement_healthcheck* source="$reportdirectory$/index_cluster_bucket_status.json" | table result.* | rename result.* AS * | table splunk_server, title, is_searchable, failureCount, expectedBuckets*, site*

`engagement_healthcheck_index` sourcetype=engagement_healthcheck* source="$reportdirectory$/indexes_by_role_and_user.json" | table result.* | rename result.* AS * | eval Users=if(mvcount('values(User){}')>0,'values(User){}','values(User)') | table splunk_server, index_name, Role, Users

`engagement_healthcheck_index` sourcetype=engagement_healthcheck* source="$reportdirectory$/role_capability_summary.json" | table result.* | rename result.* AS * | eval capabilities=if(mvcount('capabilities{}')>0,'capabilities{}','capabilities'), imported_capabilities=if(mvcount('imported_capabilities{}')>0,'imported_capabilities{}','imported_capabilities'), imported_roles=if(mvcount('imported_roles{}')>0,'imported_roles{}','imported_roles') | table splunk_server, title, defaultApp, capabilities, imported_capabilities, imported_roles, srchDiskQuota, srchFilter, srchIndexesAllowed, srchIndexesDefault, srchJobsQuota, srchTimeWin

`engagement_healthcheck_index` sourcetype=engagement_healthcheck* source="$reportdirectory$/role_heirarchy.json" | table result.* | rename result.* AS * | table splunk_server, inherited_role, roles, capabilities, defaultIndexes, searchableIndexes

`engagement_healthcheck_index` sourcetype=engagement_healthcheck* source="$reportdirectory$/apps.json" | table result.* | rename result.* AS * | table splunk_server, title, label, eai:acl.sharing, version, visible, appurl, checksum, checksum_type, homepage

`engagement_healthcheck_index` sourcetype=engagement_healthcheck* source="$reportdirectory$/schedule_search_summary.json" | table result.* | rename result.* AS * | table splunk_server, app, savedsearch_name, cron_schedule, schedule_window, next_scheduled_time, search

`engagement_healthcheck_index` sourcetype=engagement_healthcheck* source="$reportdirectory$/data_model_summary.json" | table result.* | rename result.* AS * | table splunk_server, app, datamodel, cron_schedule, allow_skew, max_time, max_concurrent

`engagement_healthcheck_index` sourcetype=engagement_healthcheck* source="$reportdirectory$/search_best_practices_index_and_sourcetype.json" | table result.* | rename result.* AS * | eval _time=strptime(_time,"%F %H:%M:%S.%f %Z") | eval status=if(mvcount('status{}')>0,'status{}',status) | table app, "index and sourcetype", "index only", neither, "sourcetype only"

panel.title: Scheduled Searches with High Concurrency by Minute

search.query: `engagement_healthcheck_index` sourcetype=engagement_healthcheck* source="$reportdirectory$/scheduled_searches_high_concurrency_by_minute.json" | table result.* | rename result.* AS * | eval _time=strptime(_time,"%F %H:%M:%S.%f %Z") | eval scheduled_search=if(mvcount('scheduled_search{}')>0,'scheduled_search{}',scheduled_search) | table splunk_server, schedule_window, overlap_minute, scheduled_search_count, scheduled_search, max_hist_scheduled_searches

`engagement_healthcheck_index` sourcetype=engagement_healthcheck* source="$reportdirectory$/datamodel_incomplete_datamodels.json" | table result.* | rename result.* AS * | eval _time=strptime(_time,"%F %H:%M:%S.%f %Z") | eval datamodels=if(mvcount('datamodels{}')>0,'datamodels{}',datamodels) | table splunk_server, app, datamodels, datamodel_count

`engagement_healthcheck_index` sourcetype=engagement_healthcheck* source="$reportdirectory$/private_accelerated_reports.json" | table result.* | rename result.* AS * | eval _time=strptime(_time,"%F %H:%M:%S.%f %Z") | eval splunk_server=if(mvcount('splunk_server{}')>0,'splunk_server{}',splunk_server) | table eai:acl.app, eai:acl.owner, title, auto_summarize, auto_summarize.cron_schedule,auto_summarize.dispatch.earliest_time,auto_summarize.dispatch.latest_time, auto_summarize, search
